Jx.Panel.DataView.Group

Extends: Jx.Panel.DataView

This extension of Jx.Panel.DataView that provides for grouping the items by a particular column.

License

Summary
Jx.Panel.DataView.GroupExtends: Jx.Panel.DataView
Options
groupTemplateThe template used to render the group heading
groupContainerClassThe class added to the group container.
groupHeaderClassThe class added to the heading.
listOptionOptions to pass to the main list
itemOptionOptions to pass to the item lists
Functions
rendersets up the list container and calls the parent class’ render function.

Options

groupTemplate

The template used to render the group heading

groupContainerClass

The class added to the group container.  All of the items and header for a single grouping is contained by a div that has this class added.

groupHeaderClass

The class added to the heading.  Used for styling.

listOption

Options to pass to the main list

itemOption

Options to pass to the item lists

Functions

render

render: function ()

sets up the list container and calls the parent class’ render function.

Extends: Jx.Panel
render: function ()
sets up the list container and calls the parent class’ render function.
